job_tasks.phrase: implementeren van GenAI technologie in de bedrijfsprocessen van onze klanten.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core task of integrating GenAI technology into business processes, which falls under the definition of traditional software development and integration to make AI features functional within a business context.

job_tasks.phrase: ontwerpen, ontwikkelen en optimaliseren van nieuwe AI-oplossingen.
job_tasks.justification: This directly relates to the design, development, and optimization of solutions, which are fundamental software engineering tasks, even when applied to AI.

job_tasks.phrase: Samenwerken met multidisciplinaire teams om AI-oplossingen te integreren in bestaande bedrijfsprocessen.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the integration aspect of AI solutions into existing business processes and emphasizes collaboration, fitting the Software Development & Integration category.

job_tasks.phrase: creëren van nieuwe slimme toepassingen die het leven van mensen beter maken.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase speaks to the purpose and impact of the AI solutions in relation to user benefit and business application, aligning with understanding business needs and strategic goals.

job_tasks.phrase: Met deze AI-oplossingen heb je de kans om grote impact te maken in allerlei sectoren, van finance tot gezondheidszorg tot overheid.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the business impact and application across various sectors, indicating a need to understand the business context and strategic goals.

job_tasks.phrase: nauw samenwerken met Data Scientists en Data Engineers
job_tasks.justification: While not a direct task, this implies involvement in the data lifecycle and collaboration with data specialists, which can touch upon data engineering aspects.
Explicitly mentions collaboration with teams, which is a key aspect of communication and collaboration.
This task involves communicating results to stakeholders, a core communication skill.

job_tasks.phrase: Continu blijven leren en ontwikkelen op het gebied van AI-technologieën en -methoden.
job_tasks.justification: This directly addresses the need for continuous learning and development in AI technologies, fitting the Learning & Adaptability category.

soft_skills.phrase: Continu blijven leren en ontwikkelen op het gebied van AI-technologieën en -methoden.

profile.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the implementation and integration of GenAI technology into business processes ('implementeren van GenAI technologie in de bedrijfsprocessen', 'integreren in bestaande bedrijfsprocessen'). While it mentions working with Data Scientists and Data Engineers, the core tasks described fall under Macro-Category A (Software Development & Integration) rather than deep model development or specialization (Macro-Category B). The role is about building and integrating AI solutions into existing systems, making it an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is quite clear about the integration and implementation aspects of GenAI within business processes. However, it lacks specific details on the *type* of GenAI tasks (e.g., model fine-tuning, prompt engineering) or specific technologies used, which prevents a perfect score. The emphasis on integration and business application strongly points towards the 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' profile.
